actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

official_title: To require the disclosure under freedom of information provisions of Federal law of certain payroll information under contracts subject to the Davis-Bacon Act.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to freedom of information to require the disclosure of certain payroll information under contracts subject to the Davis-Bacon Act.

titles.title: To require the disclosure under freedom of information provisions of Federal law of certain payroll information under contracts subject to the Davis-Bacon Act.
